column4: hey, im currently updating using the dist upgrade thing, and its taking literally forever (14 k/s!!) so im downloading the iso... question is, is it safe to kill this dist upgrade thing using system monitor and how do i upgrade using the livecd?

hey, im currently updating using the dist upgrade thing, and its taking literally forever (14 k/s!!) so im downloading the iso... question is, is it safe to kill this dist upgrade thing using system monitor and how do i upgrade using the livecd?
i dont really want to reformat, is that the only way?
the live CD cant upgrade, you need the alternate CD
